modName: College of Winterhold Bridge LOD Fix 1.1 - DELETED
summary: When playing on UltraDrawDistance with or without DynDoLOD, when looking out southwest from the Winterhold College bridge just outside the college, a rather large section of the Sea of Ghosts and the landscape behind it simply are there. Instead there is a black hole with floating trees behind it.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]Winterhold College Bridge LOD Fix[/size][/b]

Update:  Download version 1.1 Version 1.0 had one dirty edit and the trigger area wasn't big enough

This mod is a tribute to Immersive College of Winterhold by Grantyboy.  It was a shame to enjoy his wonderful creation and then having to face a big black hole in the Sea of Ghosts every time you leave. This mod addresses this LOD problem that seems to have no other solution.   

When playing on UltraDrawDistance with or without DynDoLOD, when looking out southwest from the Winterhold College bridge just outside the college, a rather large section of the Sea of Ghosts and the landscape behind it simply aren't there.  Instead there is a black hole with floating trees behind it.

This mod addresses this issue by pretending there is a ward around the college that blurs vision and makes noise as the player passes through it.  The LOD mess is still there, it is just too blurry to see it.

This mod was cleaned with TESedit in 1.1.  Version 1.0 had 1 ITM

[b]Do You Need This Mod ?:[/b]

Only if you play on ultra and have the Sea of Ghosts LOD issue where part of the ocean is just a black hole.  Otherwise this mod is just unneeded overhead

[b]What You Need:[/b]

You need only what is present in this archive and it installs automatically with MOD Organizer
This mod only depends on Skyrim.esm and Update.esm
It does not depend on Immersive College of Winterhold but was made and tested with this mod present.

[b]Script Load and Uninstalling:

[/b]Tested loaded after Immersive College of Winterhold

This mod installs one primitive and one script into your Skyrim install.  Unless your game is malfunctioning or you have >200ms script lag, this script should run ONLY when you are standing on the bridge in the activator box.  There should be no script load otherwise.

Because it installs the script GAStrig into your savegame, if you uninstall this mod the script will be left behind to cause mischief.  Use a savegame script cleaner to fix this.

You probably shouldn't save when you are standing in the trigger area.

If you can make a better script by all means post and I will incorporate it.

[b]What Does It Do ?:[/b]

In the small region of the bridge where the LOD problem is visible, it adds a primitive which activates a sound and a blur imagespace so you can't see the issues any more.  Messages tell you that you are passing though the College's protective wards.  They are inactivated when leaving the primitive.

Other NPCs and Followers don't trigger the ward.  It is possible to make them but it has issues.

[b]Credits:[/b]

Bethesda for making a scripting language harder to manage than a herd of rabid weasels
Various Skyrim scripters on the web that taught me how to herd rabid weasels
author: Sirandar
